parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration instance. You can call the **DescribeMigrationJobs** operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0** and does not exceed the maximum value of the Integer data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: MigrationJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration instance. You can call the **DescribeMigrationJobs** operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: MigrationMode.DataInitialization
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data migration instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: MigrationMode.DataSynchronization
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: MigrationMode.StructureInitialization
parameters.description: When you call this operation, the data migration task must be in the Migrating, Failed, Paused, or Finished state.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0** and does not exceed the maximum value of the Integer data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 30, 50, and 100. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data migration instance resides. For more information, see List of supported regions.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the details of schema migration. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes

*   **false**: no

> Default value: **false**
